Title: The Bakra
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Luke Schelhaas (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Lotte Verbeek, John Bell
Plot: The Artemis finally reaches Jamaica bringing Jamie and Claire that much closer to their goal. During a lavish ball on the island, the Frasers encounter old allies, as well as former adversaries who threaten to derail their mission.
